DOC.brief_summary: Title : A Phase IV , Open-label , Single-Center Study Effects Nutritional Supplement Combination Body Weight Management 90-day period
DOC.brief_title: Effects Nutritional Supplement Combination Body Weight Management
DOC.detailed_description: Safety assessment : Safety assess change blood chemistries/hematology , adverse event , nutritional supplement emergent AEs ( TEAEs ) , classified severity grade , relatedness nutritional supplement . Efficacy Assessment : The objective study evaluate efficacy ( change body composition measurement well influence appetite quality life change ) nutritional supplement administer repeatedly throughout study . Study Subject Population : Healthy adult men woman eligible participation upon fulfillment inclusion/exclusion criterion .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Females Males age 2565 year 2 . Signed informed consent 3 . BMI 25 40 kg/m2 4 . A rest normotensive blood pressure define systolic blood pressure 90145 mmHg diastolic blood pressure 50 90 mmHg 5 . Use effective method contraception female childbearing [ potential agreement continue practice acceptable method contraception duration participation study ] . Acceptable method contraception include oral , injectable , implantable contraceptive ; intrauterine device , diaphragm plus spermicide ; abstinence ( must agree use doublebarrier method become sexually active ) , transdermal patch , double barrier method include vasectomized sexual partner . Women hysterectomy tubal ligation least 6 month prior Visit 1 postmenopausal 6 . Ability speak understand English 7 . Willing fast morning visit blood sample take 1 . Selfreported chronic condition may affect subject safety ( e.g. , diabetes , cardiovascular disease ) significantly impact product effectiveness ( e.g. , chronic fatigue ) 2 . Pregnancy/suspected pregnancy , breastfeed plan become pregnant course study . 3 . Use Antihypertensive medication le 4 month unregulated clinically blood pressure . 4 . Having undergone gastroplasty bariatric surgery past 10 year . 5 . Taking medication ( e.g. , thyroid medication ) , must stable least four month . 6 . Allergies ingredient contain Nutritional Supplement . 7 . Medical treatment insomnia depression within 30days prior screen visit . 8 . Tobacco ( e.g . cigarette , chew tobacco , pipe , nicotine patch ) use within 30days prior screen visit . 9 . Planned surgical procedure course study . 10 . Currently participate another study do within 30 day prior screen visit likely enroll another clinical nutritional study . 11 . Currently take medication supplement use weight loss must discontinue prior Visit 1 Baseline Day 0 . 12 . Currently participate weight loss program participate weight loss program past 6 month .
